name: Citywise-app
body: ### CityWise mobile app. The CityWise mobile app is an easy way for city residents to submit problems they see around town to their city. Log in with Google, choose a category, pinpoint the problem on a map, upload a picture (optional) and add a quick description. Then hit submit and the issue is sent to a database your city can access to view, and fix the issues. ### Technologies. The app was built in Ionic with a NodeJS and Express back end and a PostgreSQL database. ### Screenshots ###Google Play [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ionicframework.citywise435211](Go to CityWise app in Play Store) ### Authors and Contributors By @spogburn.
